SageTVPlugin.Name: TWiT.TV Video Podcasts
SageTVPlugin.Description: Add the TWiT.TV video podcasts to your list of online services menu in SageTV. Leo Laporte's network of popular podcasts including: This Week In Tech, Tech News Today, Windows Weekly, MacBreak Weekly, The Tech Guy, and many more. Please visit www.twit.tv for a complete listing of podcasts. After installation you will find these feeds listed in the Online, More Online Service menu.
SageTVPlugin.Author: shadeBlue.com
SageTVPlugin.ReleaseNotes:
7.5 : Updated to use lower resolution thumbmails for faster loading.
7.4 : Added supprt for TWiT SD streams.
7.3 : Fixed/Added TWiT Live Feeds back.
7.2 : Update all current TWiT feeds to HD streams.
7.1 : Added TWiT Live Feeds.
7.0 : Initial Release for SageTV 7.0.
